categories-0.3: Category LibraryContentsIndex
Control.Category.Functor.Pointed
Portabilitynon-portable (class-associated types)
Stabilityexperimental
MaintainerEdward Kmett <ekmett@gmail.com>
Description

Defines the notion of a Pointed (and Copointed) functor in the sense of Lenisa, Power and Watanabe''s Distributivity for Endofunctors, Pointed and Co-Pointed Endofunctors, Monads and Comonads http://citeseer.ist.psu.edu/301388.html

A simple wrapper newtype is basically just a Pointed Copointed Functor. When a functor is both pointed and copointed then: 

 extract . return = id
 return . extract = id

NB: There is another notion of a pointed functor that can be derived from pointed spaces in topology that is *not* represented by this type. See Based in Control.Category.Based for that definition.

Documentation
class Functor f k k => Pointed f k where
Methods
